column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////UPDATE: You are very awesome for bringing your grandma to dine with us. She seems like an awesome person
column2: and I'm willing to bet she's supremely funny
column3: too -- what a smile! As hard as we try every day
column4: we don't always hit the mark with everyone who comes through our doors
column5: but every now and again we get feedback like yours that makes everything worthwhile. You're the best.
